story:
Once upon a time, in the beautiful country of Armenia, there was a little bear named Aram. Aram was known throughout the forest for his kindness and bravery. One day, as the sun began to set and the moon rose high in the sky, Aram decided to take a walk through the enchanted forest.

As he walked along the winding paths, Aram heard a soft weeping coming from behind a large tree. Curious, he approached the tree and discovered a small squirrel named Sirush who had lost her way home. Without hesitation, Aram offered to help Sirush find her way back to her family.

Together, Aram and Sirush journeyed through the forest, following the twinkling stars in the night sky. Along the way, they encountered wise owls, mischievous foxes, and gentle deer, all of whom offered their assistance to the lost squirrel and the kind-hearted bear.

Finally, after a long and adventurous journey, they arrived at Sirush's home where her family was waiting anxiously. The squirrel's family was overjoyed to see her safe return, and they welcomed Aram with open arms, grateful for his kindness and bravery.

As the night grew late, Aram bid farewell to Sirush and her family, knowing that he had made a true friend that night. With a heart full of happiness, Aram made his way back to his cozy den, feeling grateful for the magic and friendship that filled the enchanted forest.

And so, under the watchful gaze of the moon and stars, Aram drifted off to sleep, his dreams filled with the adventures and kindness he had shared that night.

Goodnight, dear child, may your dreams be as magical as the enchanted forest and may your heart be as brave and kind as Aram the bear. Sleep tight, for tomorrow is a new day full of endless possibilities and adventures waiting to be discovered.
